10244000.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「ヴェリナード:
The roof of Verinard Castle was designed based on a unique chalk shell. Rumor has it that it is a very
beautiful shell, and just by looking at it, you can hear the murmur of sea creatures and even the roar of the
tide. If you use such shells as a motif, you can make wonderful letter paper that makes you feel as if you
can hear the rustling of waves just by looking at it, can't you?

41934.「おや なんだい あんた。\n ソネーゼってのは あたしのことだけど……。\n:
Oh, what's the matter, you? Soneize is
me. What can I do for you?<yesno><break>

41935.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「用がないなら:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>If you have nothing to do, please
leave. We don't have anything rare.

41936.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「……はあ。ソー:
You want to know about Somya's parents? You asked Somya about me. Well, how could I not tell you? It is
true that I raised Somya. But you know what? I lied when I said I found her. I was asked by a couple of strangers
to take care of Somya. I had no intention of taking care of her. But when I saw how distressed they were, I
just couldn't say no. After that, they went away on the Ark of the Earth, so I don't remember their names or faces.
But you're right. I'll give them to you. I have a letter that they left with me.

41937.<pc>は ソネーゼから\nソーミャ宛ての手紙（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！:
<pc> received Letter to Somya
(Key Item) from Soneize!<me 60>

41938.「ソーミャも そろそろ 両親のことを\n 知ってもいい年頃だろうからね。\n<b:
Somya is probably old enough to know about her parents. There may be painful things written about them. But
she has to grow up knowing such things.

41939.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「ソーミャも そ:
Somya is probably old enough to know about her parents. Somya may know some hard things from that letter, but
that's what it means to be an adult.

41988.「ふうふう。酒場に買い出しに来るのは\n なんとも ひと苦労じゃのう……。\n<:
Coming to the tavern to buy groceries is quite a task, isn't it? Hello? What are you? I am indeed Keimos, who used
to be in charge of the archives at the castle. I see. You need a book written in the ancient script of the royal
family for the prince's study? Hmmm...I thought I had put all the old royal books in the library away
somewhere. Well, where is it? Oh, yes. Could you bring me <%SEV_QUE_NAME4> and give it to me? It would be a
pleasure to do so, and I might even remember things I've forgotten!

41989.「図書室にあった 古い王家の本を\n どこかに 片付けたんじゃが\n どこに片付:
I put the old royal books in library away somewhere, but I forgot where I put them. If you could give me
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, I would be delighted to remember it. If you have it, could you give it to me?

41990.「なんじゃ ケチじゃのう。\n それをもらえれば 王家の本のことを\n 思いだせ:
What a stingy fellow. If you give it
to me, I'll remember the Book of
Kings.

41991.「ゆずってもらえるのは いいが\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>を 持ってお:
It's nice of you to give it to me, but
you don't have <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>.
You'll have to come back and get it.

41992.「おおっ これは ありがたや。\n ずーっと ほしかったんじゃよ これ。\n<b:
Oh, thank you for this. I've been wanting one of these for a long time. I remember now! I had shoved the too-
old books of the royal family into the back of the bookshelf in the ambassador's office in the castle! I
don't remember which bookshelf it was, but anyway, if you search the bookshelves in the ambassador's
office, I'm sure you'll find what you're looking for.

41993.「城の大使室の本棚の 奥のほうに\n 古い王家の本を 押し込めてあるんじゃ。\n:
I have some old royal books stashed away in the back of a bookshelf in the ambassador's office in the castle. I
don't remember which bookshelf it was, but in any case, if you search the bookshelves in the ambassador's
office, you'll find what you're looking for.

41994.「オーディス王子は 古代の文字を勉強して\n 歴史などを読み解く気なのじゃろう。:
Prince Odis must be studying ancient scripts and trying to decipher history. It seems that he really wants
to be a king of men.

48323.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「ギリギリギリ…:
Just in time. That's my wife. I really hate her. I can't take it anymore. If only I could get my hands on that
thing, I could make a forbidden potion that would make my noisy wife stop.

48324.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr><icon_e:
Hey there. You're not a bad person, are you?Eavesdropping on my secret conversations. Oh, that's right. I
can't stand it any longer. I can't live the rest of my life with that woman doing whatever she pleases. Hey,
you.Now that you've heard my soliloquy, could you please fetch me the ingredients for the forbidden
medicine? The ingredients for the potion are Hellish Onion Flower, which is dropped by a monster named
<%SEV_QUE_NAME0> that appears in Verse Mountain Forest. Please fetch this ingredient for me. It is the wish of
an old man with a short life expectancy. Please!

48325.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ありがたい！:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Thanks! Will you do me a favor?Well
then, please don't tell my wife. Hee-
hee-hee.

48326.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「ヒョ。どうや:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Hyoh. It seems you are taking on too
many requests.I'm sorry, but please
come back when you have more time.

48362.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「禁断の薬を:
If you can make the forbidden potion, you can calm down a noisy wife. The material of the forbidden medicine is
Hellish Onion Flower, which is dropped by a monster named <%sev_que_name0> that appears in Verse Mountain Forest.

48363.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr><close_:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>It is the wish of an old man with a
short life expectancy. Please do me a
favor!

48328.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ヒヒヒ……。よ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hee-hee. You've come back well.Did you
receive Hellish Onion Flower?

48329.ウィーマに\nじごくのネギボーズを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><:
Would you give Wiema the Hellish Onion
Flower?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

48330.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ヒョ……。 \n:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no.I didn't get it yet. I'm sorry.
I was in a bit of a hurry.

48331.<pc>は ウィーマに\nじごくのネギボーズを 渡した！:
<pc> gave Wiema a Hellish
Onion Flower!

48332.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ギヒヒヒ！ こ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Gihihee! This is it. This is it.Now,
please accept my gratitude. Of course,
the hush money is included.

48333.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「これで……これ:
With this, I can finally make Ibixyraz, a secret remedy passed down in Leen Village! My wife snores so
loudly. For a long time, I couldn't even get a good night's sleep. But if I have the miracle drug Ibixyraz, she
will sleep soundly and I will sleep soundly, and my sleeping life will be safe and sound!

48334.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「なんで イビキ:
The reason why Ibixylaz, the wonder drug to stop snoring, is called the forbidden drug is because it surely
stops snoring, but at the same time, it has the terrible side effect of making the fins on your back itch! The
reason why it is called "forbidden medicine" is because, although it definitely stops snoring, it has the
terrible side effect of making the fins on one's back itch! Well, my wife is insensitive, so it probably won't
be a problem. Hee-hee-hee.

146895.「どこかに お手頃な価格で 錬金効果を\n つけてくれる職人が いないものかな。:
I wonder if there is a craftsman
somewhere who can add alchemical
effects at a reasonable price.

49321.「ヴェリナード教会へ ようこそ。\n この教会には 毎日 さまざまな人たちが\n:
Welcome to Verinardchurch. Everyday people from all walks of life visit this church. Just by listening to
their stories, I feel as if I am traveling around the world.

49322.「ヴェリナード教会へ ようこそ。\n 旅の方 あわてているようですが\n 何か:
Welcome to Verinardchurch. I see
you're in a bit of a hurry to get to
Verinardchurch.

49323.「まあ そんな大変なことが……。\n わかりました。メラゾ熱で お困りなら\n:
Oh, my God, it's such a big deal. Okay, if you're having trouble with Kafrizz Fever, there's something I can
tell you. It was a long time ago. A woman in Elf fell down as soon as she entered the church and I rushed over
to her when I noticed. I think she was attacked by a monster. The woman moved her mouth to say something, and I put
my ear to her mouth. I put my ear to her mouth and the woman said in a hushed voice, "One day I will have
Kafrizz Fever. The woman said in a faint voice, "If Kafrizz Fever ever becomes popular, I want you to
remember my words. I hid something under a small stone monument east of Booner Rainforest. I hope you will
look into it, because it might help you. He asked me to look into it. It is a long way to Booner Rainforest.
Please be well prepared before you leave.

49324.<pc>は キャソーに\nこれまでのことを話した。:
<pc> told Kyasso what had
happened so far.

49325.「ヴェリナード教会へ ようこそ。\n 旅の方 もう一度 エルフの女性が\n 私に:
Welcome to Verinardchurch. Travelers, let me once again share with you the words that the lady Elf entrusted to
me. I hid something under a small stone monument east of Booner Rainforest. It should help you, so
please look into it. It is a long way to Booner Rainforest. Please be well prepared before you leave. I wish you
a safe trip.

49326.「ヴェリナード教会へ ようこそ。\n 旅の方 石碑を調べに ブーナー熱帯雨林へ\:
Welcome to Verinardchurch. I see that you went to Booner Rainforest to check out the stone monument. Please take
what you received with you. I'm glad you were able to stop the Kafrizz Fever epidemic.

49327.「ヴェリナード教会へ ようこそ。\n メラゾ熱は 大事に至らなかったのですね……:
Welcome to Verinardchurch. Kafrizz Fever didn't turn out to be serious, did it? Thank God. I forgot to mention
that the Elf woman who appeared at the church in the past managed to survive. However, if her daughter in Royal City
Kamiharmui knew she was alive, she would be in danger. So, I want you to pretend that she is dead. With these
words, she disappeared from Verinardchurch.

35651.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「ああー まった:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Oh, my God, why does it take Yolei so
long to get ready? Hurry up, or the
Queen's song will start!

35652.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「女王さまの お姿を:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>It was my big pleasure to see you,
the Queen, but I'm surprised you
couldn't make it.

35653.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「故郷のカミハル:
My wife and I have been traveling around the world, away from our hometown of Kamiharmui. I have
experienced many things that I would not have known about if I had just stayed in my hometown. Traveling is a
good thing, isn't it?

35654.「ヴェリナード城下町へ ようこそ！\n 旅人向けの情報を 聞かせてあげよう。\n:
Welcome to Verinard Castle Town! Let me give you some information for travelers. To the north of the town
stands Verinard Castle, where the queen resides. South of town is a canoe stop. This is in the lake, so
you can get out of town by canoe. Here, we'll be using canoes for most of our island-to-island transfers.
You'd better get used to it.

35655.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ここは ウェナ:
This is Verinard Castle Town, the largest town on the Wena Islands. Let me tell you about the area. First of
all, the canoe dock there, the one on the right goes to Verinard South, and the one on the left goes to Verinard
North. On the west side of Verinard South, there is a canoe ramp to Verinard West. The south dock is for
Jule Island. Verinard North is a series of lands to the east, at the end of which is an amazing waterfall
called Seiren no Ootaki (Great Falls of Ren)!

35656.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ウェディ族の者:
The Weddies seem to be good fighters in spite of their slender appearance. Just look at the selection in the
Weapon Shop. They are very well stocked.

35657.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「旅の人かね？:
Are you a traveler? If so, you might want to pay your respects to Queen Diore first. Verinard Castle, where
the queen resides, is on the north side of town. It's easy to get lost in this town, so it would be better to go
there with a map. And come to think of it, the queen has ordered the gates of the castle to be closed for a while.
Apparently, the prince has done something wrong. I wonder if we can get in now. If you are interested, you
can go to the castle gate. If you still can't get in, the gatekeeper will stop you.

35658.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「いつ聴いても:
She always sings the most beautiful songs of grace. I think she has the most beautiful voice of all the
queens!

35659.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ふうふう。町の真ん:
Hmmm. Can't they do something about the water runoff mine in the middle of the town? It's a pain in the ass to go
to the tavern to buy it. It is necessary for the Queen's song of blessings to be effective, and to have
more water circulating around the island, but at least build a bridge.

35660.「この先は ヴェリナード城だ。\n<br>\n「一人前の証を持つ者に限り\n 旅:
Verinard Castle is just beyond. Only those with Proof of Adulthood are allowed to enter. However, depending
on the conditions in the castle, no one may be allowed through. In that case, I'm sorry, but you'll have to
come back.

35661.「待つのだ 旅の者よ。\n<br>\n「すまぬが しばらくの間 何人も\n ここ:
Wait, travelers. I'm sorry, but no one is allowed to pass through here for a while. By order of the queen. It seems
that the prince has been sneaking out of the castle every now and then to do something that displeases the queen.
And now the queen is preparing to sing a song of blessing inside the castle. Security must be tight.

35662.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「今日は メルーのお:
I wonder if Meru's uncle is in town today. I wonder if he is busy working at the castle. He usually comes around
this time to give us sweets or something.

35663.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「メルーのおじさ:
So the reason Lord Meru, not Meru's uncle, didn't come to town was because the queen sang a song. I wonder when
she will come to visit us again. I wonder if she will give me sweets again.

35665.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この辺りの井戸:
The well water in this area is exceptionally pure. After all, we are the closest recipient of the power of
Queen Diore's song of blessing!

35666.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「良さげなアクセ:
There are some nice accessories in stock, but I can't afford them with my meager resources. I think I'll just
beg my boyfriend.

35667.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「そろそろ 時間:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>It's about time. Now, how can I get
away from my mom and go to the castle?

35668.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「おっかぁのマークが:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I couldn't go to the castle because my
mom's mark was too tight. Damn.

35669.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「この町。なんで:
This town. Why is it so beautiful? It's completely different from the town where I live. But I don't feel at
home when it's this clean. Is it okay if I make it a little dirty? Is that bad? Of course not.

35670.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「ウェディたちの:
What kind of hair styles are popular among Weddies? It's my policy to adapt my hair to the local style when I
travel.

35671.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「女王さまのお歌:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Has the Queen sung yet? I didn't get to
hear it the other night, so I'm
looking forward to it.

35672.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「女王さまのお歌:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I heard the Queen sing! She has such a
beautiful voice. I want to hear it
again.

35673.「どうも私は テーブルとイスのある部屋に\n なじむことが できません。\n<b:
I have a hard time adjusting to a room with a table and chairs, and I'm afraid to sleep in a bed. I am also
afraid to sleep in a bed. I mean, what if I fall out of bed?

35674.「あんた 旅の人だな。\n もしかして お城に行きたいんじゃないのか？\n<br:
You're a traveler. Perhaps you want to go to the castle? This place is complicated. You have to go up and
down the stairs to reach the castle.

35675.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「海は美しいし:
The sea is beautiful and we can catch fresh fish. This town is a very nice place. It's all thanks to the song of
blessings sung by Queen Diore. Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you.

35676.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「おや いらっし:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Oh, welcome. Who are you? Are you a
traveler? We don't have anything rare.
Please go home.

35677.「女王さまが唄う 恵みの歌の おチカラは\n この町だけじゃなく ウェナ諸島の全:
I heard that the power of the song of blessing that the Queen sings has an effect not only on this town but also
on the whole Wena Islands. I heard that there is a mechanism to spread the power of the song near Jule
Island.

128642.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「あら な～に？:
Oh, what? I'm not sure I can handle a new request like that. I always give my all! I do my job with all my heart
and soul! But thank you for your service. Thank you for always being with us, and I look forward to working
with you in the future.

128643.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「いつも ご利用:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Thank you for always using our site.
Thank you very much for your continued
patronage.

35679.「女王ディオーレさまのため\n 今日も今日とて 門番にいそしむ\n 私なので あ:
For the sake of Queen Diore, today and
today again, I am busy being a
gatekeeper.

35680.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「女王ディオーレ:
Queen Diore's songs are always wonderful! However, was it my imagination that she seemed somewhat
sad, unlike usual? There are rumors that Kunai and the prince are getting along well these days, and I am a
little worried. Perhaps the queen will feel better if she hears a story from a traveler like you. Please do come
and meet her.

35681.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「お化粧のノリが:
My makeup doesn't look good. I wonder if the queen will laugh at me now. Oh, and I forgot my handkerchief. Oh,
where did I put the house key?

35682.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「女王さまの恵み:
You don't have to be so disappointed since you can listen to the Queen's song of grace many times in the
future. My family has a weakness for beautiful women.

35683.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「たいくつだなぁ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>I'm bored. I'm tired of playing the
same games all the time.

61694.「ねぇねぇ！\n なにか あたらしい遊びを しらない？:
Hey, hey! Do you want to play
something different?

35684.「さっき 王子が 町の外へ\n 出ていくのを見かけたんだが……。\n<br>\n:
I saw the prince leaving town just now. He said he was going to Eternal Maze. He was talking about the new
ruins found in Verinard North. He said you can take a canoe across to Verinard North and head northwest to
find the entrance.

35685.「女王ディオーレさまのため\n 今日も今日とて 門番に いそしむ\n 私なので:
For the sake of Queen Diore, I am busy
guarding the gate today and tomorrow.

35687.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「さっき オーデ:
Prince Odis passed by earlier and I said hello to him, but he was acting weird. He just mumbled something about
singing a song for his mother, but didn't even look at me. He must have been in a hurry to get to the Queen. I
was kind of worried. You have Proof of Adulthood, don't you? Why don't you go check on her at the castle?

35689.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「さっき メルー:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Lord Meru just came to town for a
visit! He gave me some sweets.
Hehehe~.

35690.「うちの息子が ときどき\n お菓子をもらって 帰ってくるのよ。\n<br>\n:
My son sometimes comes home with sweets. Apparently, the person who gave him sweets is Lord Meru, the
Queen's husband. Lord Meru doesn't seem to be very useful in the castle, so I don't think he deserves to be
punished for that kind of national service.

35691.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ブーナー熱帯雨:
You want to go south of Booner Rainforest? There is nothing there. Booner Rainforest is far away. You
have to go northeast through Verinard North, and beyond that, you have to go beyond Verse Mountain Forest.

35692.「今度は 永遠の地下迷宮に行くのか。\n あんたも 大変だな。:
Now you are going to Eternal Maze.
It's tough for you, too.

35693.「まだ 永遠の地下迷宮に 行ってないのか。\n まぁ がんばれ。:
You haven't been to Eternal Maze yet?
Well, good luck.

35694.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「女王さまが メ:
It seems that the queen has returned to the castle with Lord Meru. Both of them looked tired. I wonder where in
the world they were going. You'd better go and check on the prince with him as soon as possible.

35695.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「やっぱり 女王:
Her Majesty's songs are wonderful when you hear them up close! It's a real pleasure to listen to her songs while
looking at her face!

35696.「私は この町を たいへん気に入りました。\n 諸国漫遊の途中では ありますが\:
I like this town very much. I am in the middle of my travels around the country, but I think I will stay here
for a while longer. It is not because the queen is beautiful or for any such silly reason!

35697.「ヴェリナード城下町へ ようこそ！\n 旅人向けの情報を 聞かせてあげよう。\n:
Welcome to Verinard Castle Town! Let me give you some information for travelers. To the north of the town
stands Verinard Castle, where the queen resides. South of town is a canoe stop.This is in the lake, so you
can take a canoe out of town.Are you used to canoes now? I've heard there are bigger boats in this world!

35698.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「さっき 女王さ:
I went to hear the queen sing a song of grace. Besides the prince and Lord Meru, there was a woman. I had never
seen her face before.

35699.「女王さまの恵みの歌を 聴いたら\n もりもりと元気が 出てきたわい。\n これ:
Listening to the Queen's song of grace, I'm feeling more and more energetic. With this, I will be able to keep
going for a while!

35700.「ヴェリナード城に 用があるのなら\n いつでも 入ってかまわんぞ。\n<br>:
If you have business in Verinard
Castle, you are welcome to enter at
any time. Just don't make a scene.

35701.「今のディオーレさまの 次の王さまも\n 女の人が なるんだよね？\n それじゃ:
The next king after the current Diore will be a woman, right? What will happen to the prince then? I think it
would be fine if the prince became king.

35702.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「カレシに アクセサ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>I begged my boyfriend to buy me
Accessory, but he said no. Soldiers in
the castle are not paid well.

35703.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おっかぁの目を:
I was finally able to listen to the queen's song, stealing my mom's eyes! She's really good, isn't she? It
satisfies a man's romantic side.

35704.「この町。キレイすぎて いづらい。\n 自分の町の汚さが なつかしいな。:
This town. It's too beautiful to stay
here. The dirtiness of my own town is
not so nice.

35705.「ウェディたちの間で\n 流行している ヘアースタイルを\n 試してみるつもりだ:
I was going to try the hair-as-suite style that's all the rage among Weddies. But I guess it's not for me.
Too bad.

35706.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「女王さまのお歌:
The Queen's songs are always so beautiful. But I wonder what it would be like if a man sang that song? I'd
like to listen to it.

35707.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「故郷のカミハルムイ:
I would like to go back to my hometown, Kamiharmui, but master seems to have fallen in love with this town.
I've gotten used to the table and chairs, but I'm still afraid to sleep on the bed.

35708.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「恵みの歌を唄う:
I saw her sing a song of grace, and I thought to myself once again. There will never be a more beautiful queen
in the world than Queen Diore! We, the people of Verinard, are proud of her. I am glad I was born in this country!

35709.「女王さまが唄う 恵みの歌がある限り\n 私たちは 安心して暮らせます。\n<b:
As long as there is a song of grace sung by the Queen, we can live in peace. The song of grace will be
passed on to the next queen, and her voice will never cease to sing.

35710.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「まったく うち:
It's a real shame that our people are in such a bind. At my age, it's not at all embarrassing to chase after the
queen!

35712.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「女王さまの と:
I think that the woman next to the queen must be the prince's lover! She will be the next queen, right? I guess
so. Isn't that good?
